review: Okay, I didn't read anything on the page, I watched the commercial, and I have no idea what the hell this does.  I know that Amazon was desperate and used Gary Busey of all people.  You don't even see the device until the end and all it shows is what Xbox one can do with the speech thing.  The worst commercial ever with no content at all.  Makes me not want to buy it on principal.

review: If the Amazon Fire TV included HBO GO, I would buy it today! This is must have to compete with Apple TV.
author: David Emanuel

review: I wonder if most of the reviewers did the feature comparison chart showing the various other devices.  From what I see on that chart, this device trumps them all.  Love the voice activated search feature!!!!  Would love to get this product, but we already have 3 ROKU's on 3 different TV sets and they're still working....  Can't justify the cost to replace at this time.  But will definitely put this on my wish list for the future.  I will, however, highly recommend this product to a friend who presently accesses Netflix through her enabled DVD player and has nothing but issues with delayed streaming, extensive buffering, etc.  Not to mention the DVD player does not support a lot of the streaming services, including Amazon.

review: I love Amazon but FireTv is not about the customer and more about the sales. You are limited to one row on the home screen with a Prime membership.
